channel.title: Fernanda Meira's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Fernanda Meira's Blog

item.title: Webdesign trends for 2018
item.description: The year 2018 is just around the corner so I made a prediction of the next web design trends for 2018.

item.title: UX vs. UI
item.description: It is very common to mix UI Design with UX Design, and even though the names are similar, their approaches are quite different.

item.title: My freelance experience
item.description: I am a designer and after working for years in advertising agencies and big companies in Brazil. I decided to take the risk and start a freelance career.

item.title: Web Design vs. APP Design
item.description: There are differences in designing for websites and applications, and this should totally influence your thinking and projects development.
